artworks.title: Jurassic Majesty: The T-Rex
artworks.description: Step into the shadows of prehistory with 'Jurassic Majesty: The T-Rex Unleashed'. Here, the legendary T-Rex rises again, casting an imposing silhouette against the backdrop of an era lost to time. Witness the embodiment of prehistoric power as you stand face-to-face with the life-sized ruler of ancient realms. Its formidable presence, from the dagger-like teeth to the piercing gaze, is a testament to nature's untamed forces. Interactive elements invite you to uncover the enigmatic life and times of the T-Rex, igniting a sense of awe and mystery that surrounds the king of the dinosaurs.

artworks.title: Porsche 911: Timeless Elegance
artworks.description: The 'Porsche 911: Timeless Elegance' exhibit is a journey through the legacy of design and innovation. Sleek lines and refined curves define the essence of this automotive masterpiece. Each curve tells a story of speed, each line a narrative of craftsmanship. The Porsche 911 stands not merely as a car but as a beacon of enduring design, inviting you to explore the saga of its evolution and the paths it has carved through the annals of automotive history.

artworks.title: Mammoth: The Ice Age Giant
artworks.description: Venture into the chill of the Ice Age with 'Mammoth: The Ice Age Giant'. This exhibit resurrects the woolly mammoth amidst the frozen tundra of its time. Towering above, the mammoth's tusks curve like sabers, and its fur whispers tales of survival. Amidst a landscape where the mammoth reigned, discover the secrets of its existence and the mysteries of its disappearance in an experience that transcends time.

artworks.title: Tribal Echoes: The Ancestral Mask
artworks.description: Tribal Echoes: The Ancestral Mask' beckons you into the sacred world of tribal heritage. Each mask, a repository of ancient wisdom, carries the whispers of the forest and the spirits of the past. Embark on a mystical journey through tribal lore and discover the profound connection between art, nature, and the divine. Let the masks reveal their storiesâ€”tales woven into the very fabric of human history.

artworks.title: Feral Spirit: The Bengal Tiger
artworks.description: In 'Feral Spirit: The Bengal Tiger', the king of the jungle emerges from the mists of the wild. This AR experience brings you face-to-face with the piercing eyes and regal stature of the Bengal tiger. The exhibit tells a compelling tale of grace, power, and the delicate balance of life. It's a call to the wild that beckons you to delve deeper into the mysteries of this majestic predator and the enchanted lands it prowls.

artworks.title: The Caravels of Columbus
artworks.description: Embark on a journey through time with 'Celestial Voyagers: The Caravels of Columbus'. This masterpiece transports you to the banks of Seville's Guadalquivir River, where history and fantasy intertwine. Behold the Torre del Oro, a testament to Seville's rich past, as it stands majestically at sunset. Floating ethereally nearby are the famed caravels of Christopher Columbus, captured in stunning detail. Each ship, a symbol of exploration and discovery, tells a story of courage and conquest. This exhibit merges the realms of the tangible and the fantastical, inviting you to explore the dawn of a new world amidst the golden glow of history.

artworks.title: Dancing Under the Setas de Sevilla
artworks.description: Discover 'Flamenco Rhythms: Dancing Under the Setas de Sevilla', a celebration of Andalusian culture. This exhibit, set beneath the Metropol Parasol's modern silhouette, brings flamenco's passionate dance to life. Experience the fusion of emotion, tradition, and art as you learn about flamenco's deep roots in Spanish heritage. The Setas, a symbol of Seville's innovation, provides a stunning backdrop, intertwining the city's history with the timeless beauty of flamenco.

artworks.title: Portada de la Feria
artworks.description: Experience 'Luminous Fiesta: The Portada de la Feria de Sevilla', a captivating display of Spanish festivity and architecture. This image showcases the Portada, the iconic entrance of Sevilla's famed fair, adorned with countless twinkling lightbulbs. Its design, devoid of horseshoe arches, embodies traditional Spanish elements. The Portada stands against the night sky, its lights creating a magical atmosphere. This exhibit celebrates Spanish culture, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the vibrant energy and history of the Feria de Sevilla.

artworks.title: Mammoth: The Ice Age Giant
artworks.description: A fusion of classic artistry and robotic precision, this piece reimagines Renaissance masterpieces through a cybernetic lens.

artworks.title: Tribal Echoes: The Ancestral Mask
artworks.description: Explore the mind of Da Vinci as an interactive hologram, bringing his inventions to life in virtual reality.

artworks.title: Porsche 911: Timeless Elegance
artworks.description: Impressionism meets the digital age in this pixel art display, where brush strokes are replaced by digital squares.
